name: Body_fix
description:
Lora to fix tifa's body color (yellowish) and adding volume to it

https://civitai.com/models/16539/tifaarsphere

this v.02 -> result is still unstable / inconsistense, should use parameter (below 0.6 for better result) ex : <lora:body-fix-v2:0.48>,, or maybe just try <lora:body-fix-v2:0.8>.

also usable on non tifa / different models

test sample :

prompt : tifa, final fantasy 7 remake, (mature female), milf, shade of brown hair, wind. very white skin,pale skin, masterpiece, ultra realistic 8k cg, very long hair, beautiful , , reddish brown eyes, huge breasts, left only earpiece, stick earpiece, red earpiece, {one earpiece}, left earpiece, shiny skin, clean, beautiful face, pure face, pale skin, long hair, (huge breasts, beautiful breasts, ), shiny skin, skindentation, (nude ),

sampling : DPM++2M Karras

Seed : 2436795641

resolution : 1024x1400

Models : perfectWorld_Baked_VAE

  • still building sample. with add more sample later..
